abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Bloodthirst Ability TypeHeal Balmond recovers 5% Max HP after killing a Minion or Creep, and 20% Max HP after killing a hero.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Soul Lock Ability TypeMobility Slow DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 8.0 Balmond charges in the target direction for a set distance or until he hits an enemy hero, dealing 150 (+60%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. The enemy hero hit will be knocked back slightly and slowed by 60% for 2s.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Cyclone Sweep Ability TypeAOE Buff DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 6.0 Balmond gains 15% Movement Speed that decays over time and spins with his axe for 3s, dealing 25 (+25%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit to nearby enemies up to 14 times. Each subsequent hit on the same enemy will deal 7.5% increased damage (up to 60%). The Physical Attack bonus portion of the damage can Crit.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Lethal Counter Ability TypeBurst DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 34.0 Balmond unleashes a huge strike in the target direction (cannot be interrupted), dealing True Damage equal to 150 (+70% Total Physical Attack) plus 30% of the target's lost HP. This skill only deals up to 1000 damage to non-hero units.
